Class BehaviorBase

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core.Input
Assembly
FlowGraph.Core.dll

Base class for behaviors with default no-op implementations.

public abstract class BehaviorBase : IBehavior

Properties

ActiveInStates

Override to restrict this behavior to specific states. Return null (default) to be active in all states.

public virtual IReadOnlySet<string>? ActiveInStates { get; }

Property Value

IReadOnlySet<string>

IsEnabled

Whether this behavior is currently active. Disabled behaviors receive no events.

public bool IsEnabled { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

Name

Display name for debugging and UI purposes.

public abstract string Name { get; }

Property Value

string

Priority

Priority relative to other behaviors. Higher = called first. Default behaviors use 0. Use negative for "always last" behaviors.

public virtual int Priority { get; }

Property Value

int

Methods

IsActiveInState(string)

Checks if this behavior should be invoked for the given state. Default: active in all states if ActiveInStates is null/empty.

public bool IsActiveInState(string stateName)

stateName string
